title: Premier League: Fulham 2-3 Everton highlights
description: Watch highlights as Dominic Calvert-Lewin scores twice for Everton in a 3-2 win at Fulham, with the home side missing a third consecutive penalty.

title: Cardiff violence: Six hurt in disorder and stabbings
description: One person has serious head injuries and three others are thought to have been stabbed, police say.

title: Coronavirus: £3bn for NHS but Sunak warns of 'economic shock' to come
description: Borrowing - which hit a record £22.3bn in October - cannot go on indefinitely, chancellor says.

title: China seeks to retrieve first Moon rocks since 1970s
description: The Chang'e-5 probe is hoping to assist in better understanding the Moon's origin and formation.

title: Covid-19: Strengthened tier system for England after lockdown
description: More areas will be in higher tiers, and the tiers will have tougher rules - but the 10pm pub curfew will ease.

title: 'Relentless, ruthless England are like All Blacks - but is a problem looming?'
description: Former England scrum-half Matt Dawson explains why playing Eddie Jones' side is like facing the All Blacks.

title: Caroline Kayll death: Paul Robson charged with Linton murder
description: Paul Robson is accused of murdering Caroline Kayll and the attempted murder of a 15-year-old boy.

title: Missing fishermen: Search off Sussex coast resumes
description: Two crewmen have not been seen since their fishing boat sank off the Sussex coast on Saturday.

title: Covid-19: FDA allows emergency use of antibody drug Regeneron
description: Regeneron says its antibody treatment is effective when used early after a Covid-19 diagnosis.

title: Labour anti-Semitism row: Starmer has 'no vendetta' against Corbyn
description: Shadow Chancellor Anneliese Dodds tells the BBC's Andrew Marr the Labour leader is acting "robustly."

title: Elephant rescued from deep well in a 14-hour operation
description: It took a team of 50 people to carefully hoist the animal out, upside down.

title: Archbishop of Canterbury: Justin Welby warns against foreign aid cut
description: He joins Microsoft founder Bill Gates in urging the UK to think global in its post-Covid recovery plans

title: Shark attack in Western Australia kills man near Cable Beach
description: The attack near Cable Beach is the eighth fatal shark attack in Australian waters this year.

title: iPhone 12, Pixel 5 and Mate 40 Pro cameras put to the test
description: BBC Click puts four of the latest phones - including the iPhone 12 and Pixel 5 - to the test.

title: US election: Trump camp's lawsuit struck down in Pennsylvania
description: The judge said the efforts to invalidate millions of mail-in votes were "without merit".

title: Newspaper headlines: 'Stricter' tiers loom, and PM faces legal action
description: Many of Sunday's papers lead with news England is set to enter a tougher tier system post-lockdown.

title: US election 2020: Why Trump gained support among minorities
description: Joe Biden won the election, but support for Donald Trump increased among black and Latino voters. Why?

title: The Indonesian meteorite which didn't sell for $1.8m
description: You saw the headlines of a $1.8m meteorite? Here's the real story and it's just as fascinating.

title: Four reasons Topshop is not the brand it once was
description: The chain's parent company is understood to be seeking emergency funding after being hit hard by coronavirus lockdowns.

title: Lauren Aquilina: The pop star who gave up singing
description: After quitting her record deal, singer Lauren Aquilina found herself learning to love music again.

title: The coronavirus pandemic 'great reset' theory and a false vaccine claim debunked
description: We unpick some of this week's misleading claims about the pandemic and the coronavirus vaccine.

title: China gives musical talent show a virtual makeover
description: Dimension Nova shakes up reality TV with computer-animated contestants performing to real judges.

title: Horse racing: 'It doesn't matter what colour you are'
description: Kanane Francis says he wants to encourage young black riders to get into horse racing.

title: One couple's six years on the road (and counting)
description: After Dan Colegate nearly died, he and his partner Esther left their careers for the open road.

title: How a new type of glove can reduce environmental damage
description: Scientists at Cranfield University in Bedfordshire have developed a new type of latex.

title: Cambridge paralysed dancer's hopes for wedding day 'slow dance'
description: Alex Collins became partially paralysed after diving into a shallow river to retrieve a plastic ring.

title: Covid makes Brazil's president Bolsonaro a hero to some
description: President Jair Bolsonaro is seeing his approval ratings rise in the north-east of Brazil.

title: Match of the Day: 'How 'impressive' Tottenham beat Manchester City
description: Match of the Day pundits Alan Shearer and Ian Wright believe Tottenham Hotspur are title contenders following their 'very impressive' 2-0 victory over Manchester City.
